thread.title: Tori Spelling Admits to Having Sex With Brian Austin Green
thread.title_full: Tori Spelling Admits to Having Sex With Brian Austin Green

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Tori Spelling Admits to Having Sex With Brian Austin Green
text:
Comments The 42-year-old actress admitted that she had a secret sexual relation with her 'Beverly Hills, 90210' co-star, Brian, when they were young. 
Tori Spelling made a surprising confession in an upcoming Lifetime special, "Tori Spelling: Celebrity Lie Detector". In a sneak-peek for the special, the 42-year-old actress admitted that she had sex with her "Beverly Hills, 90210" co-star, Brian Austin Green . Host Louise Roe asked Tori, "Did you have sexual relations with any of your co-stars on 'Beverly Hills, 90210'?" After a heavy sigh, Tori answered, "Yes." Lie detector attached to the actress even confirmed that what she confessed was true. Of why Tori looked emotional when giving the answer, she said, "Yeah, I just got chills. I was a young girl." When Louise asked whether or not it was Brian, Tori coyly admitted, "Yeah, Brian and I were the youngest. We were 16 and I remember the first time I shook his hand and I had like that..." Louise interjected, "You fancied him." The " Mystery Girls " actress confirmed, "I did, I fancied him." "He teased me. He teased me a lot. He would always come up to me and say that I had, like, peach fuzz," Tori recalled. "And he pulled up my peach fuzz and he'd be like, 'Oh my gosh, you are like my little lamb chop, you're like my Chewbacca.' " The actress also admitted that she hoped him to like her. Brian aside, she also confessed that she had sex with other co-stars from the show. The special will be airing October 3 following the premiere of the original Lifetime movie, " The Unauthorized Beverly Hills, 90210 Story ".
